name: Telewiz
description:
React fast and avoid the lasers and explosions by instantly teleporting! Each level is 20 or 30 seconds long and there are 10 levels in total.

Controls:
NUMPAD 1-9 or
QWE
ASD
ZXC
Each button teleports you to the corresponding white square in the game (try it in the game's menu).

SPACE to start the game, P to continue from the last played level (but a true master of teleportation will play all levels in succession from beginning to end)

This is my first ever submission to a game jam, and actually the first game I ever made (aside from tutorials I followed). It's simple and short, but I hope you like it! :)

Game by Lukas Maier, Music by Nara Shin

Other assets used:
Sounds
https://kenney.nl/
https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names

Sprites
https://opengameart.org/content/8x8-character-and-sprite-sheet
https://opengameart.org/content/8x8-cave-platformer-set
https://gagnepixels.itch.io/free-futuristic-tileset
